name: BOX KAR RACING: ST0RM
description:
THE WORLDS WORST RACING GAME RETURNS!!!

The Sequel to 2021's BOX KAR RACING is finally here!

  • Worse UI
  • Awful Music
  • Half Assed Maps
  • Dull Customisation

And More to come!

Race around generic maps going through hard to find Checkpoints and wonder why this game was made!

Reviews:

  • "This is the Postal 3 of Video Games" Vincent Desee
  • "What a load of bollocks!" Jimmy Maye
  • "Eh, I kinda dig the music." Samuel Vacklind
